Key Match Events: KL Rahul scored his second consecutive fifty which included four boundaries and three maximums.
Hardik Pandya pummelled the visiting bowlers into submission with his unbeaten 30-ball 71.
Cameron Green put India on the back foot with his 30-ball 61.
Matthew Wade took the visitors over the line with four balls to spare.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia took a 1-0 lead in the three-match series.
